post:
Hello guys,

I have some good news, our 128MB vps package is back! Our servers are located in Sweden, your vps will be hosted in our own private cloud, each vps has a 1Gbps shared uplink connected to our 10GB backbone switches.

This vps and all our other packages are perfectly suitable for movie sharing websites, warez websites, torrents and more. We do not allow coin mining, ddos attacks, cam software, SPAM.

Control panel to manage the vps (including VNC) is included (reboot, reinstall, etc), 
Instant activation after payment.

Sweden Dedicated does not oversell, all our nodes feature dual quadcore or six core processors and plenty of memory, good SAS disks in raid10.

No contract

No setup fee

Instant activation!

Free ipv6

Free rDNS

Bitcoins accepted!

In this business since 2006!

128MB memory
256MB burstable memory
8GB storage
500GB bandwidth
1 ipv4 ip
1Gbps uplink
€5 per month

Order here:  http://swedendedicated.com/portal/?ccce=cart&a=add&pid=71 Or find out more here: http://swedendedicated.com/vps
